description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Souvenirs militaires. Napoléon à Waterloo, ou précis rectifié de la Campagne de 1815; avec des documents nouveaux et des pièces inédites. Par un ancien Officier de la Garde Impériale, etc. [The dedication is signed, G. de P., i.e. Count Louis Gustave Le Doulcet de Pontécoulant.]" Author: P., G. de. Contributor: LE DOULCET, Louis Gustave - Count de Pontécoulant Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9220.ee.16." Page: 70 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1866 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002742303 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
